features: Upgrade Design: According to customer need, this doorbell mount is designed for adjusting every angle you need. The top of mount has angle scale to help with precise angle adjustment.The button of the mount has a screw to help you fixed an accurate angle you want, which can not be moved by others

All-round Coverage: The upgrade video doorbell mount made by high quality hard plastic, stable & durable, fully wraps your doorbell to protect your video doorbell well. The video doorbell mount has wire hole, design for wired video doorbell. Our doorbell mount can be protect your doorbell better than the market other brand. Please try to use. (Patent Pending)

Wide Application:COOLWUFAN Video doorbell mount is suitable for most brand video doorbell mount, Blink Eufy and video doorbell 1 2 3 4 & 3Plus. WARM Tip: Please measure the size of your video doorbell before order

Easy to Install: The upgrade doorbell mount not only can be stuck on your wall or door without drilling, which has strong 3M glue on its back, but also can be installed on the wall by drilling with screws. It depends which way you want to install, which can decrease damage to your house. The doorbell mount is come with stainless-steel screws and screwdriver. Please read the manual before install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Oh my goodness, this mount surpasses my expectations in quality, performance and appearance! As you will notice from pics my Ring Video Doorbell fits perfectly snug with the help of the insulation/cushion that is included. Easy to install, love the range of angle and that you're able to lock it secure (screw included). I'm very happy with this Anti-Theft Mount and now have peace of mind knowing the doorbell will not be stolen. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great video image and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Not going to lie I was very skeptical about this camera!!! I am 43 and not tech savvy! This was a no brainer. I bought 2 different video doorbells and this is by far the best and the subscription for the year was very reasonable. Definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product but you may need buy a screw
reviews.reviewText: Made well but would like if there was a metal version and a white option I would appreciate it . My two cons for this would be the set screw that is provided for the angle is too short. Another is that the foam even though is good quality it muffles the sound if you try to talk to the person at the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mount makes installing the Blink2 Camera even easier
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a mount which would allow me to articulate the cameras position and then secure it when it was obtaining the specific view I was seeking. This mount achieved those objectives. The small hood over the top of the camera helped to protect it against the elements and it keeps the lens clear of moisture when it rains. This mount holds the camera securely and permits it to be aimed right where you want.I like the thumb wheel for locking the mounts position. You can reposition the base to obtain the angle you are seeking, but make sure to hold the mount attached to the camera up where you plan to mount it, as you may need to rotate the mount base to get the proper mounting angle and also secure the camera where you want it. Make sure the position you mount the base permits you the ability to make the small adjustments necessary to obtain the preferred camera view and angle.The only negative comment I have about this is like many imported items, it comes with cheap mounting screws which are made of soft material. Do yourself a favor and get an assortment of higher quality screws in various sizes to make properly securing the camera bracket even easier.You can probably use the screws which came with it, but you are likely to damage the screw heads when securing them, which means its going to be harder to remove the damaged screws someday. Just buy some quality mounting screws for the surface where you intend to use this and you will be happier.Mounting the Blink2 cameras outside is certainly easier with these mounts than without them. The additional protection of the shroud and hood around the camera are good to protect it from the weather. Just note that the camera will report its temperature through the Blink app to be a little higher than the actual temperature because of the black color and the restricted airflow to the camera. When the camera reports the temperature when using this mount, it's usually about 5 to 7 degrees Fahrenheit higher than the actual outside temperature. This doesn't affect the cameras performance or operation, its just not an accurate depiction of the outside temp.This small temperature discrepancy and the cheap mounting screws are the only issues I have noticed with using this mount on the exterior cameras. No doubt that mounting the Blink2 cameras is easier and more secure when using this mount verses without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You can adjust and lock the angle you want the camera to face and the screws are a unique shape and size that I haven’t found another screw driver to be able to remove them so great for anti theft and water protection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good mount if you are looking for something that turns 90 degrees if on a sidewall. Does what it is designed to do. Saw some reviews that say it does not work with wired versions. Those comments are incorrect. I had this mounted and installed in 5 min and wires move when adjusting just fine, just make sure you have a little slack when you go to adjust the mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lock screw too short to keep doorbell from rotating. Brass nuts breakoff from plastic.
reviews.reviewText: Just as another customer stated in their review: There were 3 equal length screws provided (only 2 are required). One to secure the case together and the other to lock the case at the desired angle and keep it from rotating when the bell is pushed. But the screw length was too short to lock the case into place from rotating. I spoke to Amazon customer service. They will send out a replacement unit. Hopefully, it will come with a longer lock screw to keep the doorbell from rotating.Update: Amazon has sent two replacements. Each time, the screws are too short and the brass nuts break off from the plastic. The only thing secure about this holder is the last picture/video you will have as the thief walks away with your doorbell. It's plastic junk with wrong screws. Going to get a metal doorbell holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bulky - Not for all model doorbell cameras.
reviews.reviewText: It is pretty bulky and kind of sticks out. It fits some of the brands of doorbell cams very well from what I see in their description and would make installation easy. It does not work well for a smaller model. It did not look like it was going to work for my Simplisafe model without some additional home made support within this unit. Update: I finally figured out how to rig so that this would work for my Simplisafe doorbell camera and was able to make it work. Sure would be nice if they would offer the needed modifications for specific models rather than just a few.

Se sienten bien los materiales, se siente resistente, se ve bien, un poco complicado la instalación, viene con todos los tornillos pero sin manual (que realmente no hace falta mas que para saber como abrirlo) , mi único detalles es que fue necesario usar el mismo relleno para colocar bien el dispositivo y batalle para cerrarlo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice and Secure, extra protection for the blink XT2 cameras
reviews.reviewText: Mount base made of rust proof cast aluminum. Relatively easy to mount. Much more secure than original Blink mount and much better range of adjustment angles.Great hard case for the Blink XT2 cameras. It was so easy to install and give my Blink cameras that extra protection. It also adds another lay of weather resistance. The price was right and the fit was perfect.
Better than the mount that comes with the XT2. Easy to install, seems solid so far

I'm using this camera at my front door so I can see who's approaching and also so I can talk to them. So far everything is working fine. The picture quality is good. When talking there is a bit of a delay. Sometimes it can be frustrating because you're talking over top of one another.
Bought two of these to mount my Blink cameras. Excellent product except I had to send one back because the lock nut was broke. Other than that this mount is very solid.
